[http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=viewProduct&cid=5&scid=31&localeCode=EN_USA&pid=586 Product page (US)]
[http://www.smc.com/files/AJ/SMC_2870W_V2_UG_EN_Final.pdf Manual] [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/24637-smcsmc2870w ''Tim Higgins'''s review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (Dec 2003)
[http://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=722&num=1 Review on '''Phoronix'''] (May 2007) There may be multiple revisions / versions of this device. For this particular unit... *The Sub-Assy Number is 91-012084-242. *The Supplier Part Number is 99-012084-242. The wireless interface OUI appears to be (or include) 00:0A:E9 ('''AirVast''').
